Headline: No trains between Forest Park and Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and Clark/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available between Forest Park and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
